works.complaint:
This person was a former friend of the mentioned  
project manager and they have since had a falling out.
This person has posted several derogatory posting on other sites such as  

Yelp that they have since removed.  They use the exact same posting each  

time to try and discredit Eduardo the project manager but not My company  

Level One Maintenance Ltd.
This is malicious and is now approaching harassment toward my employe Mr. 

Silva and my company Level One Maintenance Ltd.
Their entire statement is false and libelous at best and short of  
harassment.
I would hope that Google would force this person to either identify  
themselves so we can prove as a company that we have never worked for them
 
and thus opening the door for us to eventually file suit for libel against
 
this person.  If it were indeed a client I would respond to this  
complaint.  However, we are 100% certain who this person is and Yelp felt 

their false comments warranted removal because this person refuses to  
identify themselves.  I have personally talked to each and every client at
 
the end of each project and not once did anyone ever complain about my  
project manager so I therefore feel I have a need to defend my company  
about these frivolous claims
